segments.text: I notice the garden outside looks so peaceful through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, everything's about to go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is running full blast, and the sink is overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's spilling onto the floor, soaking the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn't see it; she's just polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress will get wet if she steps back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children climbing up high on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it's tipping; he could fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, encouraging him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he drops those cookies or the plate, it'll be a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off the water before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene makes my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem so unaware of the dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR
